page.title: 28Industry and Population
page.content:
Although there were no pits in Sutton a lot of the men were miners so when the closed along with Pretty Polly in April 2005 and Samuel Eden in July 2005, the town slumped into unemployment but with the introduction of supermarkets like Asda, B&Q or Matalan the economy is slowly getting better with a population growing to around 43,000, but the economy still has a long way to go.
Anita Edwards
